answers.question: Telegram Handle We Can Use To Contact You
Link to your Public Group Chat

answers.answer: Eppie is applying for the 6th time. (last GG22 Round)
answers.question: Have you participated in a previous Gitcoin Grants Round? If so, please name the rounds or link the builder profile associated with previous rounds.

answers.answer: Eppie is a 100% Open Source project. Our code is available on GitHub and we encourage the community to get involved with the project. While building Eppie we actively contribute to other Open Source projects, e.g. we have developed a C# authentication library for ProtonMail.
answers.question: How does your project contribute to the growth of the OSS ecosystem? Please provide specific examples of how your application enhances or expands the current ecosystem.

answers.answer: Eppie is an open protocol privacy-first serverless email. It features strong private key encryption, p2p messaging, decentralized backup and intuitive identity management. Eppie is built for maximum interoperability. It understands many existing decentralized as well as conventional web2 address standards. Specifically, Eppie offers a client mode for conventional email services, which allows users to keep using their normal emails while being gently introduced to web3 ecosystem.
answers.question: What features or use cases does your dApp/App present? How is it differentiated?

answers.answer: At the moment we are focused on the core product development: that is the messaging protocol, decentralized network node and Windows application. The funding is going to help us complete this development and conduct an independent security audit, which is essential to the project given its privacy-first and open-source nature. In the future we will add support for more platforms, desktop and mobile, and expand the capability of our decentralized node, including support for more decentralized address standards.
answers.question: What are your plans for further development, and how will the grant funds be used to achieve these goals?

For any project deploying smart contracts on blockchain networks, please list all your deployer addresses and their corresponding blockchain networks. Use this format for each entry: [deployer_address], [chain_id]‚Äîfor example, 0x123abc..., 42161 (This represents a deployer address on the Arbitrum network). Please include a separate line for each unique deployer address and blockchain combination.

project.title: Eppie ‚Äî Email 2.0 ü¶Ñ
project.description:
Eppie is a people-powered alternative to Gmail. We're shifting email from provider-centric to a user-centric model, giving users greater independence and control over their communications. Eppie's decentralized architecture, now combined with powerful local AI models, delivers unlimited convenience and next-gen privacy.

Support development with Gitcoin! üöÄ

[Download GUI client](https://github.com/Eppie-io/Eppie-App#install-from-microsoft-store-app-store-or-google-play) | [Download CLI](https://github.com/Eppie-io/Eppie-CLI#downloads) | [Subscribe](https://eppie.io/)

## Designed differently

![image](https://finebits.com/apps/eppie/table.png)

## Exciting New Possibilities üî•

- Connect and communicate using your existing email addresses *and* your ENS address.
- Attach crypto payments directly to emails.
- Use local AI agents to help with negotiations, inbox organization, translation, and more.

## Key Features

- üåé Works on all major platforms: Windows, macOS, Linux. iOS and Android coming soon.
- üì¨ IMAP/SMTP compatible: Works seamlessly with Gmail, Microsoft Outlook, etc.
- üîë Proton Mail Support: Eppie is the first native desktop client to support Proton Mail.
- ü§ô Web3 Interoperability: Communicate easily with Ethereum, Bitcoin, and other networks (coming soon).
- üîí Privacy-first: Everything is encrypted by default using elliptic curve and AES-256 encryption.
- ‚ù§Ô∏è User-friendly and thoughtfully designed.

## The Team üë®‚Äçüíª
We are 10 nerds with a passion for decentralized web. We have over 10 years of experience building multi-platform applications and expertise in crypto technologies.

## Project Updates üõ†
**Builds for Linux and macOS are out on [GitHub](https://github.com/Eppie-io)!** üéá  

Also, we're making significant progress in integrating advanced AI capabilities into Eppie, enhancing both security and user experience.

Here's what we're up to:
- **AI Agents:** Local AI agents will provide personalized assistance with various tasks such as email organization, content summarization, translation, negotiation support, etc. 
- **Enhanced Security:** Advanced spam filtering and phishing detection will significantly improve the security of your communications.
- **Improved User Experience:** Convenience features like smart categorization and semantic search without ever allowing any server to read your emails!

Access our source code on GitHub and help us build a truly revolutionary email experience! Public alpha versions of both the GUI and CLI applications are available for testing. We welcome your feedback and contributions! And we'd love to see your stars on GitHub! ‚≠êüòÅ

[GitHub](https://github.com/Eppie-io) | [Subscribe](https://eppie.io)

![image](https://finebits.com/apps/eppie/eppie.png)
Create an Eppie account by accepting your Seed Phrase.

![image](https://finebits.com/apps/eppie/eppie1.png)
Start decentralized messaging like it‚Äôs a normal email.

![image](https://finebits.com/apps/eppie/eppie2.png)
Connect your existing mailboxes and crypto wallets. Make them public or make them invisible at will.
